title: Trillion Emerald Diamond Studs - Pachala Pendants
materials: Sparkling Cubic Zirconia. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Classic stud earrings featuring a striking Trillion cut Emerald at the center. The Emerald is surrounded by a halo of shimmering CZ diamonds, creating a beautiful contrast. The triangular emerald brings modern sensibility to the traditional style.
occasions: and Diwali. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to office attire or elevating a simple outfit.
description: The combination of the precious emerald and the modern trillion cut is a unique selling point. The traditional emerald gemstone is combined with western-style cubic Zirconias. The classic design ensures timeless appeal and easy integration into any jewelry collection. Comfortable and secure for daily wear.
